'''''Silver Leaves'' 3''' ("Tolkien and Fantasy Art & Artists") is the third issue of ''[[Silver Leaves]]'', the journal of [[The White Tree Fund]], published [[2010]].

==Contents==
*[[Ted Nasmith]]: "Inspired by J.R.R. Tolkien"
*P.R. Miller: "Paint! Draw! Sketch!"
*Lewie Nerino: "Pictures from the Perilous Realm: Tolkien as an Artist"
*Jonathon D. Svendsen: "A Power of Myth"
*Alicia Angst: "When Words Become Art"
*Kathryn E. Darden: "Andy Serkis - From Gollum to Screwtape"
*Anne Marie Gazzolo: "Footprints on the Heart"
*P.R. Miller: "The Gift of Art"
*Jessica Moritz: "Tolkien Reading Day 2010"
*[[Kristine Larsen]]: "Silmaril or Simulacrum? Simulations of the Heavens in Middle-Earth"
*The Old Maid of Toon Zone: "Abstract of "Arda of the Hobbits""
*[[Tom Shippey]]: "J.R.R. Tolkien: ''The Legend of Sigurd and Gudr√∫n''"
*Anthony Wilkens: "Equating Tolkien to Plato"
*[[Constance Wagner|Constance G.J. Wagner]]: "At Rivendell"
*Missy M. McClure: "Visionary Hues"
*James G. Shoopman: "Tolkien's Composite Christ"
*[[Jef Murray]]: "October Country"
*[[Brian Sibley]]: "More than Just the Margins: An appreciation of [[Pauline Baynes]] (1922-2008)"
*L. Lara Sookoo: "A Unique Vision: Silver Leaves Interview with [[Tim Kirk]]"
*Alexa Chipman: "Interview with [[Anke Eissmann]]"
*[[Constance Wagner|Constance G.J. Wagner]]: "Reflections From A Far Green Country"
*P.R. Miller: "Breaths"
*Julie S. Dobbins: "A Lesson in Perspective"
*Alicia Angst: "The King Has Returned"
*Frank Sun: "Flora's Wish"
*Laura Glendenning: "A Trip to Middle-Earth"
*Kathryn E. Darden: "A Shieldmaiden's Song"
*Constane G.J.: "Arresting Strangeness: Fantasy Fulfilled in ''The Lord of the Rings'' on Stage"
*Anne Marie Gazzolo: "Hope"
*Kathryn E. Darden: "When ''Lord of the Rings'' Fans Attack: Can fans turn into orcs?"
*[[Tom Shippey]]: "''The Hobbit'' in Frisian"
*Kerri-Anne Cundill-Hinds: "White Shores are Calling"
*Christina Drikes: "''The Fellowship of the Ring'' Concert (with film) Review"
*John Adcox: "''The Lord of the Rings Online'': Falling into a Story"
*Kathryn E. Darden: "The Hunt for Gollum"
*The Old Maid of Toon Zone: "Tolkien and Shore Together in Concert"
*Art by [[Pauline Baynes]], Daisy Brambletoes, Catherine Chmiel-Gugulska, John Dickerson, Julie S. Dobbins, Colleen Doran, Eaneli, [[Anke Eissmann]], Kovalevskaya Ekaterina, Chloe Giordano, Nayla Ibraghimova, [[Tim Kirk]], Virginia Lee, Gerda Marz, Hyatt Moore, [[Jef Murray]], [[Ted Nasmith]], James Orman, Mya Popova, Cassandra Stevens, L. Lara Sookoo, and [[David Wyatt]].
